OSU - Nutrition Education Program


About OSU - NEP

The internal content team for OSU's Nutrition Education Program website desired a simpler content management system, with more intuitive site architecture and admin interface. To help the OSU - NEP team accomplish their goals, we rebuilt the NEP site on Drupal 7, designed and implemented a new site layout, and created flexible content types for the team's resources.

Responsibilities

My intial contributions to PeaceHealth were QA'ing JIRA tickets for development work, and styling the admin user interface with CSS/Sass. As the project grew, there were more opportunities for me to contribute, and I began doing Drupal development work for PeaceHealth.

Some of my main contributions for this project included building a module for the top navigation; creating detailed documentation for the PeaceHealth admin team's training; testing and configuring the Workbench module according to the team's needs; styling the footer content and Medical Center banner flyouts, as well as the administration interface theme.
